divs: Sighting DetailsOutside taking still shots of a rainbow with my camera (cybershot). I never noticed the object with the naked eye but later when I came in to upload pics I happened to notice the orb. I thought the object could have been preciptation but as you can tell there was not a drop of rain around us and the wind was pretty calm at the time. The object was just in one frame of the shots that I took. bright white orb. The object never appeared to the naked eye. Could have been just precip but the storm died before arriving at airport and developed on the north side of town after completely dying out before arriving at airport.
Summary: Still shot of rainbow orb appears in one shot
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Valdosta
There were no other sightings in Valdosta on or around July 7th 2012
